title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved at Lake Roosevelt? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.  NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.    Volunteer Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area is looking for volunteers who are committed to our mission: providing safe outdoor recreational experiences and preserving and protecting the cultural and natural resources for the benefit and enjoyment of the public, now and in the future.    Work With Us The National Park Service seeks students, professionals and other qualified individuals from numerous academic disciplines and trades for a wide variety of internship, seasonal and permanent positions available nation-wide. We encourage all interested and qualified persons to apply for jobs.    Do Business With Us Thank you for your interest in doing business with Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area.    Planning This page is your portal to significant recent and past park planning documents.
